summary: This is a simple replacer for the Azura Shrine Statue.
descriptionHtml:
Sexy Azura Statue
Author: Edhildil
06,22,2014
ver1

LOL!

OK, this is a simple replacer for the Azura Shrine.

This is mostly just a silly mod but I thought some of you would like it.

Some people have been requesting other body types but its too heinous, sorry.

Install by extracting to your data folder.

Uninstall:

delete data meshes clutter statue shrineofazura01.nif

Some people are having a conflict with No Sow Under Roof mod

No Sow Under Roof mod workaround:

1) Create the following folder structure under DataMeshes...

PrometheusArchitectureStatuesSnow

2) Copy the shrineofazura01.nif from this mod to the 'StatuesSnow' folder, and rename it to....

AzuraStatueSnow.nif

(thank you moirai)

My other statue mods:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55601/?]Edhildils Meridia Statue[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55398/?]Edhildils Nocturnal statue[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55781/?]Edhildils Winterhold Mage statue[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55167/?]Sevenbase Dibella statue[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55195/?]Sexy Mara statue[/url]

Tools:

Blender
Nifscope
FRAPS
Microsoft Paint (BMP to JPEG for screenies)

Credits:

Edhildil (statue)
Sevenity (sevenbase body)
Bethesda (original statue mesh)

Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

Usage

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
